meta.content: Jeopardy Archive James Kosmatka Johnna Mahoney Rani Peffer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6716.

td.p: James Kosmatka, a theater manager from Cleveland Heights, Ohio
Johnna Mahoney, a medical student from Lancaster, Pennsylvania
Rani Peffer, a corporate finance manager from Crittenden, Kentucky (whose 4-day cash winnings total $56,712)

tr.td: 4-LETTER EDIBLES
BLAME IT ON THE RAIN
PIGGYBACKING
ALL YOU NEED IS "OVE"
TV PHYSICIAN
HEAL THYSELF

(Alex: Yes.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: There are three accepted pronunciations--a "JY-ro," a "JEE-ro",
or a "YEE-ro".)
[Laughter]
(Alex: You can use any one, but you were right.)

a gyro

Johnna
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
